Commands.Stone: Earth BRV magic attackTarget: Delay 1 turn
Commands.Medica II: Increases BRV × 1.2Allies: Grants BRV based on own BRV
Commands.Pulse of Life: Party: Recovers HP based on own MAX HP, revives fallen allies; grants BRV based on own MAX BRV; 8 turns MAX BRV Up IISelf: 8 turns BRV RegenAfter use: Stone, Medica II use +1 (with upper limit); HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ for 8 turns

Artifacts.BRV Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Stone: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Stone by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Medica II: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Medica II.

Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Stone Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Stone.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Medica II Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Medica II.
Passives.Medica II Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Medica II.
Passives.Stone Charge: Increases the max uses of Stone by 1.
Passives.Stone Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Stone.
Passives.Medica II Charge: Increases the max uses of Medica II by 1.
Passives.Presence of Mind: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Moderately raises DEF while BRV is at least 50% of MAX
Passives.Stone Extension: When using Stone:•Slight damage boost•5 turns BRV Regen
Passives.Last Boost: Slightly raises MAX BRV if HP is MAX at start of last wave
Passives.Medica II Extension: When using Medica II:•5 turns MAX BRV Up I to allies•Slight boost to allies' BRV bonus
